document.full_text: libya's top oil official became the latest leading figure to desert muammar gaddafi on wednesday, complaining of "unbearable" violence and adding political momentum to a revolt against the leader's long rule.
document.title: libya oil chief defects as nato extends campaign
lines_and_colors: libya's top oil official became the latest leading figure to desert muammar gaddafi on wednesday, complaining of "unbearable" violence and adding political momentum to a revolt against the leader's long rule.
